Detailed Description

This class is a location in the navigation mesh.

NavLoc::NavLoc ( const NavLoc &  guess,
const Vector3 &  point 
)

Constructor from a similar navloc and a point in world coords.

First it tries the same waypoint, then the same waypoint set, and if that fails then it resorts to the full world point search.

Destructor.
